updates.title: New ways to write and invite in channels
updates.description:
It’s now easier to create and preview formatted messages in Slack. Hitting the button as you type brings up a formatting toolbar, allowing you to bold key words, start a bulleted list and more.

It’s also easier to invite many members into a channel at once. Simply paste a list of display names or emails into the channel invite window to add up to 1,000 people in just a few clicks.

updates.title: Dark mode
updates.description: Whether you’re working in a low-light environment or just need to give your eyes a rest, dark mode has come to Slack. You can access it from the Themes section of your preferences and if you’re on the latest Mac desktop app (4.1.0) you can sync it to your operating system too.

updates.title: In case you missed it
updates.description: We’ve made Slack even easier to use—with announcement channels, longer channel names and a simpler way to find the person you’re looking for. There’s a whole lot more, so read our rundown and start taking advantage of these features today.

updates.title: In case you missed it
updates.description: From a dedicated drafts section in your channel sidebar to dark mode on mobile, there’s a handful of new features that help Slack better fit the way you work. To help you take advantage of all our latest features, read our rundown of what’s new.

updates.title: New apps for Office 365 and G Suite
updates.description:
Automatically update your Slack status based on your calendar, respond to meeting invites, send emails into Slack, and more with the new Office 365 and G Suite apps for Slack.

Connect the tools you use every day like your calendar, email, and files with Slack to simplify common, everyday tasks.
updates.url_title: Connect your daily tools with Slack

updates.title: Discover new channels with search
updates.description: With a newly dedicated “Channels” tab in search results, it’s now easier to discover and join new-to-you channels across your organization. Whether or not you know a channel’s full name, you can find channels with a name, purpose, or frequently discussed topic that match your search.

updates.title: Give productivity a boost with Slack Tips
updates.description:
Ever feel like you could be getting more out of Slack? Good news! There are dozens of tips about getting more out of Slack in the all-new, aptly-named Slack Tips.

From hosting a daily standup to monitoring marketing analytics, Slack Tips has productivity-boosting how-to’s for just about everyone. Discover how to make your work day a little simpler, no matter what work you do.

updates.title: Say hello, new look
updates.description:
You may notice things starting to look a little different around here — a little fresher, a little simpler, and (we think) a little better.

As of today, you’ll see a new app icon wherever you use Slack. In the coming months, you’ll see new looks, new images, and things that feel more put together. Everything else remains, reassuringly, the same.

updates.title: In case you missed it
updates.description: Some small-but-nifty improvements to control and convenience have recently made their way into Slack. From choosing how long you want your status displayed to sharing OneDrive files without leaving Slack, here’s a roundup of some of the most notable updates you can start using today.

updates.title: In case you missed it
updates.description: You may have noticed a few changes in your Slack workspace recently — new emoji, clickable search filters, and more. In case it slipped under your radar, we’ve rounded up some of our handiest updates for you.
